pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, November 10, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, November 10, 2016:

Sydney, Nova Scotia

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the official opening of the Veterans Affairs Office in Sydney, Nova Scotia with Minister of Veteran’s Affairs Kent Hehr and will deliver remarks. A media availability will follow.

Veterans Affairs Canada
70 Crescent Street
Sydney, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later 10:45 a.m.


12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Veteran’s Affairs Kent Hehr will meet with Veterans at the Royal Canadian Legion.

Royal Canadian Legion Branch 128,
10 Wesley Street
Sydney, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:10 p.m.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
